nodes.text: Bon was a male Bothan who lived on Almas during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

When some warehouses in Forard on Almas were covered in anti-Lavina Durada-Vashne Wren graffiti, Bon and fellow Bothan Illy were hired to guard them, despite the fact that neither of them had any previous security experience. They were not very professional and spent the time playing games on their datapads.
